pages.title: Context Pointer
pages.text: A one-way street that lead mana.

Generally, a Magick Context can only complete one casting, but the context pointer allows us to achieve multiple castings. The pointer can be placed on the ground, just drop the Magick Context on the pointer, and the Magick Context will be arranged in order.

As long as we right-click the context pointer with the wand, the Magick Context inside will be combined into one, and the Magick Contexts inside will be executed in order when the magic is released. If the Type carried by the Magick Context is Spell Form, then the subsequent spell will be executed after the form triggers the target.
